products.title: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bold, scarlet red panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Ruby Red Panel Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their ruby red bella blackout panel blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.

products.title: Bella Blackout Chilli Red Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This chilli red panel blind freshens up any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Scarlet High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Scarlet is an enticing shade of red that welcomes you in to put your feet up and rest easy. By combining a unique ribbon ladder with an immaculately polished surface that shimmers in the light we have created something a little special that will add a deluxe touch to any room in the home. Turn the living room into the colourful and relaxing space you have always wanted it to be by pairing scarlet with some cobalt blue walls and wooden flooring.

products.title: Unishade Blackout Fr Morello Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Offering complete light blockage & resistentance to moisture. Their stunning unishade range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. Product id: sdb-pfr0605 fabric colour: morello red material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes unishade blackout fr morello red perfect fit roller blind in red.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1269 Classic Red - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1269 classic red - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Roller, 4159 Bright Red - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Semi-transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Venetian, 7060 Passionate Red - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows. Water and stain resistant - well suited for bathrooms and kitchens. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Venetian, 7060 passionate red - velux loft blind control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows.

products.title: Bayham, Red - Vista Blind
products.description: Add a modern touch to your home with the striking and elegant bayham red. With the light dancing its way through the delicately woven voile panels you will be able to create the perfect ambience to suit the occasion by titling the flowing red fabric any way you please. Perfect for bringing a contemporary style into any room in the house. Use red in rooms where you want to bring something a little different to the table.

products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash scarlet red electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold red roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.title: Bermuda Plain Raspberry Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Available in a range of sunny colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. Bermuda is also available in their panel and vertical ranges. This pink roller blind is perfect to create a cosy feel in your home and will add a splash of colour to the room of your choice. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows. products.title: Carnival 15 Ochre Electric Roller Blind
products.description: This vibrant yellow electric roller blind will add a splash of colour to any room in your home. The fabric is a beautiful shade, perfect for styling with wooden tones throughout the home. Electric roller blinds can be operated using a remote control or paired with their smart hub. A smart hub allows you to control your blind operation using amazon alexa & google home. A real modern touch to your interiors.

products.title: Musa Chilli Red Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Rich red trees on a soft, neutral background makes the musa chilli electric roller blind really pop. This simple yet impactful design is printed on quality fabric with an electric control mechanism to adjust the blind with ease, wherever your window is positioned. This stylish blind is a practical option for a contemporary living space.
